context: DoorDash, Inc. is a food delivery and local commerce platform focused on restaurant delivery, grocery, convenience, and merchant services. IPO during pandemic food delivery boom. US market leader.

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Major competitor and #2 in US food delivery market

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Established food delivery platform, acquired by Just Eat Takeaway

competitors.name: Postmates
competitors.notes: Delivery platform acquired by Uber in 2020

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery competing for delivery driver supply and consumer attention

competitors.name: Caviar
competitors.notes: Premium restaurant delivery acquired by DoorDash in 2019

competitors.name: Seamless
competitors.notes: Part of Grubhub focused on urban markets

competitors.name: Deliveroo
competitors.notes: UK-based delivery platform with international presence
